website_summaries.verdict: Comfort is the word for these sandals, from the webbing toe post to the built-in support that mimics the arch of your foot.
pros: Comes in Black and Aqua or Gunmetal
Paneled synthetic upper, jersey lining, anatomical arch support, EVA outsole, and rubber outsole
cons: Unisex styling and limited color choices
Some report these run smaller than the Slap 2 design

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 normally, but ordered a 10 after reading the other reviews. Glad I did, they fit perfectly, as shown in the picture (excuse my ugly feet) and look really nice. They feel soft and should last a while, would buy them again. ... Update, since the flip flops are so soft the feet sweat easier, not what you want during summers, so only 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the original Reef Slap Sandal?
customer_reviews.text: I must have owned 5 pair of these Reef Slap sandals - we go to the beach for all of our family vacations and I wear them all summer as well. They WERE the most comfortable pair of flip flops I owned. These were harder plastic, the size 9 was almost a full size smaller than my other Reefs and the fabric strap that goes between your toes was rough. Had to send them back, the were that uncomfortable. Don't know if Reef has a different manufacturer but I'm giving up and have gone to a different brand. Miss those old Reefs!
customer_reviews.author: SBmom

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOOVE Reef Slap II
customer_reviews.text: I have severe back and hip problems and these are the cushiest thongs out there. I own 7 pair and live in them. I have a high instep too and these actually provide some support too. - You need to try them! Also you can buy them in men's too but unlike other shoes you don't need to go 2 sizes smaller, 1 is fine. I wear an 8.5 women's show and I order 9 women's or 8 men's and they both fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: RobertaJS

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Pool/Deck Side Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so these aren’t the most attractive flip flops but man are they comfortable. I’m a mom of 2 little ones who’s days of trying to be sexy are over, so I’m trading in pretty for functionality, safety & comfort. I purchased these for a vacation resort in Orlando where I could chase my kids around the pool area without worrying about slipping and falling, and these were absolutely perfect for that. Get these if you want to be comfortable and safe. In terms of sizing, I’m a solid 8.5 shoe and the 9 fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: As always, love these sandals! Had the last pair for a few seasons and probably should have replaced them sooner, but they kept going! I finally bought a new pair and they’re just as awesome. Perfect fit, extremely comfortable (like a cloud wrapped itself around my feet), nice arch support, and extremely durable. I mean, I can wear these guys strolling, in the water, or hiking. These sandals do it all!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Non-skid, cushion, comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a flip flop wearer. I exercise a lot and it's a relief to take your shoes off after exercising to a cushioned slipper with a bit of a slight arch support. It's also easy on your foot if you're walking for quite a bit too! I would walk in these on the beach bike/walk path so that when I turn around I like to be in the waters as I don't want to carry my shoes around, too sandy. It's so comfortable! Also, the bottom grips is good too! I've slipped when using Oakley's on sand. It also provides foot relief to my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: omega

customer_reviews.title: I love them, ordered 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.text: yes yes yes..comfort comfort confort.. I too read reviews, ordered 1 size up, am 8, ordered 9. Perfect fit, the comfort is through the roof for me. I injured my left foot 2 years ago, pain was horrific, plsntar fasciatis from it, have to wear onky soecific types of shoes, Asics etc, One of the first flip flops i can wear with no pain to foot or lower back! So excited, I have tried so many many many dhoes and spent a lot of money unfortunately in doing so, theses flip flops are perfect, I just ordered another pair!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Too small :(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work out. I am a size 11, and I've had Reef flip flops before, so I was utterly shocked when the length was simply too short. I have never once needed to purchase a size 12 in any kind of shoe, but since 11 is the largest size available, I'm just completely out of luck on this one, or any other Reef flip flop it seems. I'm incredibly disappointed because these flip flops are so soft and comfortable, with perfect arch support and cushion on the heel.
customer_reviews.author: chimbomba

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest flipflop ever, plus good looks and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was put off by the price. I needed some cheap flipflops for the swimming pool locker room. Reefs are comfy, provide support (most flipflops are terrible for your feet) and they look good. They are very well made and I'm happy I bought them. But I ended up not using them in the locker room because the water gets down into the strap openings and sloshes around. They are not appropriate for the shower room. Walking on a beach, hanging out or going on a cruise ship? You bet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne Freese

customer_reviews.title: Not the some product, they've cheapened it
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these flip flops for years. I've had two previous pairs that provided excellent comfort and support. However, the recent order delivered a pair that was miss-sized and the replacement, I discovered is not of the same quality as the first two pair I've owned. The arch support is practically gone. I will be returning both and will be going to Zappos to find something better. . I don't understand why manufacturers continue to compromise the quality of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Tough Choice

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops ever
customer_reviews.text: Long time lover of Reef sandals, first time buying them off Amazon. Super comfortable and take a beating. Had my last pair for 5 years before my dog did them in and I had to finally replace them, realistically they were ready to be retired. Other brands the tongue rips off after the first person gives you a flat tire, these have stood up to a lot of people stepping on my heels(I have big feet and short legs, it happens a lot. I can't help it). If you're tired of your flip flops falling apart seriously check out Reefs, they're durable, comfortable and dry very quickly when they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion and can wear all day with no pain
customer_reviews.text: I love these reefs. I had another pair before and lasted me 4 years and I wore them almost every day. I have had two spine surgeries and need comfortable flip flops that won't hurt my back these are great nice cushion and well made. The sizing is perfect too I where a 6.5 to a 7 bought a 7 and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marsi T

customer_reviews.title: My go-to sandals every single year
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth or fifth pair of these that I have purchased over the years since I was a teenager. They are the most rugged, comfortable, versatile sandals; more durable than regular skinny flip flops. Reef makes incredible products. I do replace them every two years not because they are failing, but because I like brand new fresh sandals. Mine always get paint, gardening soil, etc, and they always keep kicking.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysAmyBrand

customer_reviews.title: good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair a year ago and one shoe ribbon broke at the toe point. I had a hard time replacing them. Because of the experience of the toe ribbon breaking, I don't recommend wearing them in sandy shell beach areas; but for day to day walking around they are the best very comfortable and they don't slop off my foot so are less likely to catch on things that stick out on sidewalks and curbs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but smelly!
customer_reviews.text: First, as far as comfortability these get 5 stars...very well-made shoes. My complaint is that they smell terrible when they get wet. I have a pair of flip flops that I wear to only to the pool when I swim laps...they are on wet feet in and out of the pool and I've never had an odor issue with them. These got minimally wet while I was outside watering flowers and have stunk worse than any other flip flops I've owned. Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lilaea

customer_reviews.title: BEST Flip Flops EVERY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST flip flops. My husband purchased these for me almost four years ago. I was so sad when they finally broke. I decided to then jump on the band wagon and buy a pair of Olukia flip flops. They were TERRIBLE. I returned them and asked my husband to locate the reefs he purchased for me years ago. He found them. I still love them!!!! You will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LooseBoltsRob

customer_reviews.title: My go to sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef brand sandals. Always will!! They’re my go to and fit well. I have wide feet and these fit comfortably and give extra support since I’m on my feet a lot as a stay at home mom and having hard tile floors. They’re great for the lake- and floating rivers even. You won’t slip with the grip on the sole. Can get them wet and they dry quickly. Just a great go to sandal!! More on the sporty side. :)
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first, but mine loosened up after use
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8, and that is what I ordered. These are so tight! I hope that they will loosen up with time, but I may return them and order the next size up. Other than that they are comfortable, but SIZE UP!! UPDATE: After a few days and some bruised feet on the top, these have loosened up and are MUCH more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Reef Fanning for many years and decided to try the Slap. They are awesome. Much softer than the Fanning so you feet feel cushioned. Same arch support and fit as the Fanning, just softer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Look great and feel great on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Already have several pairs of these Reefs, always order a size larger than your normal size, they seem to run small in my opinion. I love how they fit and the arch is perfect for all day shopping or on the beach. They clean up really well and last longer than your normal flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: About 12 years ago, a friend gave me a used pair of Reef Slap 3 flip flops. I am historically hard on shoes, but those held together all these years, only recently starting to come apart. I had not realized any flip flops could be so well made! I bought this sandal because of my experience with the old ones. The first pair shipped was too small, I returned my size 8 for a 9, which fit my wide feet. The exchange was fast and easy! The shipping was fast! The sandals are comfortable and look like the quality is still there! ... I only wish they had been available in a color besides black.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on stellar reviews of these flip flops. They are not soft, cushiony and comfortable like the reviews I read. I did order a size up as recommended, which worked well, as they fit perfect, but the foot bed is hard and bumpy and the bottoms are Extremely slippery! I wore these on a cruise. It had rained lightly, the floors on the deck were a little wet and I damn near wiped out. I wore these once and won’t again. They may be great for others, but they're not for me.
customer_reviews.author: RainyA

customer_reviews.title: ... a pair of these sandals in 2015 and I loved them. the "normal" width (M) was wide enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these sandals in 2015 and I loved them. the "normal" width (M) was wide enough for my feet and the sandals were super comfy. I bought the same model/style number in the same size, and the damn shoes are well over a size and a half too small. boo. if you put the sandals side by side, old and new pairs, it's blatantly obvious that someone got the sizing all screwed up. I gave them to my 10 year old daughter. they're still squishy and have good support, I just can't get my feet in them due to the size difference.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Shimamoto

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support, shoe makes me smile. :)
customer_reviews.text: Can you imagine a sandal that makes you smile? Every time I slide into these and stand up I actually smile. Reef has combined crazy comfort with good support for the ahhhh experience. I bought a pair at an outlet mall 5yrs ago and wore them out cosmetically with constant summer wear - the shoe still feels new. I finally went online and figured out what I had - the Reef Slap. This year I've bought 3 more pair on Amazon! They have good arch support and cradle your heel while you sink into the squishy sole, it's heaven! You think I'm kidding? Try a pair, you'll never wear anything else. I'd give these 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Sue

customer_reviews.title: These run small AND made my foot hurt so that I can't walk on them
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated reveiw***: These are just okay. They run a bit small, so be warned. They are not that comfortable and they do not have a good arch support. ***After wearing these for about a week, they made my big toe joint hurt so much that I can't wear them. Don't bother buying these. There are too many negatives, and too many better sandals out there.
customer_reviews.author: Taradiddle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Neuropathy
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from neuropathy after chemo, I ordered these because wearing the flat ones were making my feet hurt a lot at night and these ones really relieved my feet from the pain. They are super comfortable, and they are light not heavy at all. I wear them all the time! I ordered a size 8 they are a bit snug, but I read this from the beginning and I ordered them my size anyway. I like that they are a little snug as I don't like to drag them. If you suffer from any feet condition these are great to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Order up if 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from Plantar Fascitis in the past and my sister in law swears by hers, so I had to try them out. They are very comfortable and have given me no issues. If you are a half size, I suggest ordering up. First pair I ordered down and the pair ended up going to my daughter. I re-ordered myself the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Richards

customer_reviews.title: let me explain
customer_reviews.text: amazing shoes for cushion and arch for persons with back pain! The only reason for the middle score is because they run VERY small. order a full size to size and half up. They do not have size I need so I will keep smaller pair sense I am only using for indoors while I am in my kitchen with a hard wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: I like Reef flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of Reefs for several years and it was time to replace them. It took me a couple of days to break them in but after that they became just as comfortable as my old pair. They are a little more expensive than some others but they last me for years which makes it well worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: DJG

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flip flops hands down (In pic I provided, they are in black, and they fit same as the brown). I own them in almost every color, and this specific style I've been wearing for years. Some flip flops I have to order a 1/2-whole size up, but this specific style, I wear my usual size (you could order a 1/2 size up if you are in between sizes, and probably be fine). They provide great arch support, not flimsy, comfortable to wear all day long. I always carry these with me when I may have to slip off an uncomfy pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: S.C. Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: Not up to size!
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday present for my wife. I was so disappointed when they didn't fit; She is size 8, so I purchased this shoe in a 9, but to my surprise the sandals barely fit her!!! I sent the shoes back and got a size 10 instead....guess what?...STILL too small. So we ordered a different Reef sandal in a size 8 and had no issues. I don't know what the heck is going on with the sizing of this particular sandal but it is not worth the money or the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: I love Reef sandals BECAUSE they provide good arch support
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef sandals BECAUSE they provide good arch support, and the molded foot-bed means they don't tend to slip off your foot when walking quickly, or even running a short burst. I climbed a ladder in them safely! I recommend highly. Look good, fit well, and wear well too. One thing to mention: for ME, they fit well. But some people, I know, like their flip-flops a bit big (I don't, I trip over the toe). If that is you, you want a half size larger, because this is a "perfect" 7 - not too small, but no room to spare. With the molded bed, I think that is the way it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable except the inner edge of the strap is not as smooth as it should be, so it rubs on the skin -- specifically where edge meets the upper part of the feet. I expect this to resolve as I continue to wear
customer_reviews.author: tcn4u

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair - my old pair, over 6 years old, still have quite a bit of cushion but the straps were starting to look a little worn, so I thought I'd just check to see if I could even find them available anywhere, and I was so excited to find them, I ordered a new pair.....just in case they aren't available for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Patty A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flip flop - no break in time required.  Great wet and dry.
customer_reviews.text: They were delivered on Thursday and Saturday, I wore them on an all day rainy day climb in Puerto Rico. Very comfortable. Good footing for a flip flop. I was careful but I didn't slip once. I do wish they had 1/2 sizes. My last Reefs were an 8 but after reading the reviews, I ordered a 9. The 9 does fit but an 8.5 would be perfect. I normally wear an 8 - 8.5
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Reef style. Extremely comfortable, unbelievable comfort in the sole with added comfort in the heel area. This is the style that does not have the bottle opener in the heel which makes the difference. I wish Reef made these in multiple colors, they used to and I’m disappointed they don’t!!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Dilberakis

customer_reviews.title: Too big and wide
customer_reviews.text: I returned these for a different style Reef They were much too wide for me. I could not assess the support and comfort accurately since my foot slid around too much. I ordered the size recommended from the chart but overall just too big and clumsy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Reefs and I love them. I wear a 7.5 if I can get them if not its usually a toss up between a 7 or 8. I ordered a 7 and it fits fine. My foot fills the whole bed and has about 1/4" to spare. I think an 8 would be too long. Just enough arch support without being uncomfortable. I bought a more expensive flip flop from another company at the same time. I much prefer the way these feel. I like a little thinner sole but these aren't too thick by any means. I would recommend them and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Bryant

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for some flip flops I can wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some flip flops I can wear around the house all day while I am doing housework. I have tile throughout my house so it is hard on my feet if I don't wear some supportive shoes. These were a bit narrow, but I suspect they will stretch out as I wear them more. I docked a star because on the top of both of my feet I had some sort of reaction to the shoes that lasted about a week! I don't know if I am mildly allergic to their material or what, but I will try wearing them again this week!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This style that i love so much causes me soo much pain.. I no longer buy Reefs..
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Reef hardcore fan for years! I mean YEARS! like 10 years.I buy 4 to 6 pairs at a time thats how much i loved them. Until now. I have been getting pain in my leg and it was these stupid sandals. I tried a different pair all day and vola.. pain in my leg was gone.. I couldn't believe it so i wore them again..and the pain came back. i was like holy crap! and I kept buying them thinking it was the sandal needed to be replaced..NOPE..
customer_reviews.author: Chole Charles

customer_reviews.title: Reef for life
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Reef slap flip flop I purchase at Amazon. I cannot be barefoot as my feet hurt. I have gone thru so many different flip flops throughout the years. These have been the best I ever worn. I can be on these shoes all day long. Cushion is excellent and support of my arch superb. They run a bit small, as I am size 6 but had to order a 7. Also, they are a bit pricey for flip flops, but to me worth every penny. Amazon had the cheapest price I saw out there. I am hooked with reefs for life. Hope they keep making this good product for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Odeisa H

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandals, Reefs are very comfortable and are good quality. My only comment, after owning about 10 pairs of Reefs, is that if you get them wet they seem to develop a smell. The soles are very thick and padded so they do provide a lot more support than normal flip flops. You can walk for a long time in them or all day even!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mother-in-law, who is 85 and has bunions and flat feet! I went to a local surf shop to try them on before purchasing through Amazon and sending them to her as a gift. These are super sturdy, REALLY comfortable and run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Nili R. Novik-Alben

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best sandals I have ever owned. They are supportive and do not rub my feet at all. I wear them to run errands, on the boat, walking the dog, and around the house. I even bought a pair as back up in case anything happens to my current ones. I am an 8 wide and the regular 8's fit me well. I do not have high arches or flat feet. My arch is moderate and foot is wide at the bunion. Buy these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Felt like my feet were almost hanging over the back and ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but what ever happened to Reef flip flops? This style runs small. I am a reliably 8 M and this 8 M flip flop it is really skimpy - Zero room to spare on length or width. Felt like my feet were almost hanging over the back and the sides. Not comfy at all. I might have kept them if not for the plastic/vinyl/fake leather band. Dug into the top of my foot - not comfortable at all. Also, the once-cushiony bottom felt very stiff and uncomfy. I have been wearing my Reef flip flops for a couple of years and am not giving them up yet until I find a replacement as good as them.
customer_reviews.author: psl

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a nerve problem in my foot where I can't stand to wear closed shoes. These are my go to for in the house and outside in the summer. They support the arch and are squishy and not hard. I have bought several pairs in the past.
customer_reviews.author: motherbear

customer_reviews.title: Very skimpy on the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11, ordered that size, and my toes hung over the edge. These are at least one size off....had to return. They are very nice looking though, and seem to be well made. I've owned a pair of Reefs (different style) for over 6 years and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyv

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable flip flop!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Reef sandals for years. They are my favorite "beach shoe" but I also find myself wearing them shopping and on errands where I'll be walking a lot. I typically wear a 7.5 but a 7 in this sandal fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Reef Slap 3 Sandals. I wore the first pair out over a period of years. Love these! They're comfortable, provide some arch support and foot cushion. Great looking. I fully intend to buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: whtravin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only flip-flops my daughter can wear, my whole family loves them. They are the most comfortable, quality flip-flops I've ever found. The part that goes between your toes is not too thick, therefore my daughter can wear them all day, with her narrow little feet. Your children will outgrow them before they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Mitten

customer_reviews.title: Can stand up to miles of walking!
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and heel spurs. These are not only the only sandals I can wear without foot pain, but some of the only shoes I can wear without foot pain. Literally walked over 15 miles in them one day on concrete and dirt paths. Comfortable the entire time with no pain or stiffness afterwards. Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Great support, but not as comfortable as I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Due to foot issues, I have to buy shoes with good support. With these flip flops, I got the support, but they are so hard, I find it difficult to wear for any length of time. Mostly just using for when we go out in boat.
customer_reviews.author: DJones

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support. Shoe makes me smile.  :)
customer_reviews.text: Can you imagine a sandal that makes you smile? Every time I slide into these and stand up I actually smile. Reef has combined crazy comfort with good support for the ahhhh experience. I bought a pair at an outlet mall 5yrs ago and wore them out cosmetically with constant summer wear - the shoe still feels new. I finally went online and figured out what I had - the Reef Slap. This year I've bought 3 more pair on Amazon! They have good arch support and cradle your heel while you sink into the squishy sole, it's heaven! You think I'm kidding? Try a pair, you'll never wear anything else. I'd give these 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Sue

customer_reviews.title: I really love these flip flops however
customer_reviews.text: I really love these flip flops however, if you are at all a half size please size up! I took a 9 and am usually a 9.5 and really wish I had a 10. The are great even though a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: astraone

customer_reviews.title: These are my go to flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these same style of Reef flip flops for a few years, it takes over a year of constant use before I wear them out and need another pair. The price on Amazon is about the best I have found because I have researched it alot. These have support on the arch rather than just flat like most flip flops. Love Reef!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Most confortable flip flop EVER.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. Great arch support. My small toe does not hang off shoe like with others. Soft and extremely comfortable. I love them. I did try others. They were not the same. This has become my go to flip flop. You will not regret purchasing this flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: Fehl Co.

customer_reviews.title: Reefs for the win
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Reef shopper for life. Versatile and reliable. Wear them with a casual summer outfit to a picnic and walk right into the creek in the backyard. Go camping and wear them in the shower. Take them to the pool or beach. Keep in mind though, the black soles absorb the heat, so tuck them under your towel. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way that you will not LOVE these flip flops. I was originally looking for the ones with the bottle opener in the bottom (not because I would ever need it but because that is what my old ones had). I found these and they looked pretty close to what I was looking for (and I liked the color options better) so I ordered them. MUCH more comfortable than my old ones - they seem to even have a little arch support which surprised me. In any case - these are my new favorites!
customer_reviews.author: GQ Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Great Flip Flops!  Worth the $!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfy flip flops I’ve ever owned! I wear them around the house most of the time, but the arch support has really helped my feet that were giving me trouble with flip flops that lacked support.
customer_reviews.author: Tenn. Mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9 Wide or a 9.5 Medium - Gave this pair of size 9 flip flops to my daughter and ordered a 10 for me. The 10 fit great. We both love them. Takes a little while to break in the thong that is between your toes. Once broke in they are very comfortable and really like how cute they look. I only gave them 4 stars because of the break in period and I think they run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️💓💖💝
customer_reviews.text: Favorite flip flops ever! So comfy and I don’t feel like I might die or fall on my face when I wear them in the rain! Always a plus when you don’t slip and slide all over the place when they are wet on the bottom or under your foot👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Runs REALLY Small but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable but run really small! I'm normally a 7.5 or 8 so I ordered an 8. My tires were right at the edge and so we're my heels. I exchanged them for a 9 and they got. I'm going to keep them but I could almost go another size up. The pic attached is size 9. Like I said, I wear a 7.5 or 8 in everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Reef Women's Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these flip flops! Reef brand has become my go-to brand for flip flops because unlike other brands, all of the styles I've tried have wonderful support. They are all very cushiony, and you don't have to worry about achy feet even with frequent wear. This is the first time I've tried this particular style, and I will definitely be ordering more. The heel support in this style is amazing - they feel like a sport flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: great buy and last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I want another and can't find them. Lasted for years. Don't care for slap 2 nor the one with can opener. This sandal was a perfect purchase. please resell them. will order more
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L. Velando

customer_reviews.title: Can walk all day in these and feet don't hurt!
customer_reviews.text: Once May rolls around I wear sandals until October. I love my Reefs and this is my second pair. They are sturdy and the footbed is so comfortable and supportive that I can walk all day on them and not feel sore. I also use them on walks around my block in the evenings and the support is great for that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Athena J.

customer_reviews.title: Love these Reef sandals
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Reef sandals for over 10 years and have many different colors. This is the 2nd black with aqua sandals I’ve ordered. I have to break them in for a while as my older pair is really broken in! I have a mostly stone floor on the first level and I appreciate the thick rubber sole of the Reef sandals to help buffer the impact of the hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mica

customer_reviews.title: Comfort that wears for years
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these sandals! Confession, this is my third pair. I wear them a ton all summer and they still last a couple years. Very comfy, slight arch which helps for those with high instep, and a wide and comfortable strap. I'd worn my last pair three summers, and I think they'd still serve as a back up pair... except a neighbors dog hauled off one of them while I was working on my car. So to amazon I went to find the same ones! Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: eJoy

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of reef flip flops similar to these years ago that I was wanting to replace. These are great. They fit just like my previous pair. They support the arches in my feet and I find them to be super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, extra cushion
customer_reviews.text: Loving these sandals! I bought the size 9 which is my regular size and they fit just perfect. No part of my foot hangs over anywhere, extra cushion in the heel makes these feel great. I've worn other models of the Reef sandal but this is much more comfortable and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE REEF!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE REEF!!! I got these to replace my old Fanning Reef flip flops. I typically wear size 11 shoes and size 10 sandals/open toe shoes. I had previously purchased a size 10 in the Fanning which was a perfect fit. After reading the reviews on the Slap 3 I decided to get the 11 and i'm definitely glad that I did. My reaction after first slipping these on was that the length of the 11 was exactly what i wanted but they did seem a little bit snug. After walking in them a bit they have started to loosen up and I think these will be a great replacement for my Reef Fannings.
customer_reviews.author: creatiVe

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these sandals for gardening, poolside, basically, outdoor use only. The nonslip surface is perfect and my feet stay put! They're comfortable and form to my feet and the material between the toes doesn't rub. I do replace them every 4 years or so, because I'm rough with outdoor shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mmm114

customer_reviews.title: The perfect flip flop
customer_reviews.text: These are y far the best fitting and most comfortable flip flops I’ve ever worn. I’ve been a reef fan for many years. Why had it taken me so long to find these. I’m a yacht detailer, so the non slip soles are perfect for work and play.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy  Casey

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE FLIP FLOP!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flip flops!! These are just as comfortable as my athletic running shoes. I have severe arthritis in my big toe and have difficultly finding shoes that don't cause me pain. They are very comfortable. Lots of cushion for a bouncy step. Great quality and totally worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops - so happy I got these!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pair of Reefs- I really needed a good pair of flip-flops that I can actually walk in without my feet hurting after a few blocks. my husband loves his Reef flops & recommended them. I Wore them to our trip to outer banks- the house we stayed in unfortunately had dirty floors so I wore them the whole time through the house—- they are amazingly comfortable !!! ... like walking on a yoga mat. I normally take an 8-8 1/2 but ordered a 9 - I have wide feet - the 9 was perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Scott Eustace

customer_reviews.title: Great Flops
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good, but being in 1/2 sizes the 7 was a bit shorter than expected for my foot, so I needed to try other Reef Styles with a longer foot bed, as a 8 would be too big for me. I also have narrow space in toes so I need to make sure the toe piece is soft and comfortable which these are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer MM

customer_reviews.title: i really dont like the cheaper sandels that offer no arch support and ...
customer_reviews.text: i really dont like the cheaper sandels that offer no arch support and chafe. you pay a little more for these but its worth every penny. i can walk around the park and do errands for the day in these without getting sore feet before there is proper reinforcement through the arch, and the entire sandel. you dont feel those pesky pepples on the sidewalk come through before there is enough padding. very comfortable, and would highly reccomend. i'll likely buy them again when i wear through this pair.
customer_reviews.author: bookah

customer_reviews.title: Runs small....can't wear!
customer_reviews.text: Runs really small. Measured to my other Reef's and they are supposed to be same size, but new ones are a significantly shorter!
customer_reviews.author: KAY PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sporty
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully supportive flip flop. I have foot issues but do not feel them in this shoe. Ordered a size up (usually a 9.5, ordered a 10) and feels great out of the box. Will wear around the neighborhood and update if there are any quirks.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are the only ones I've found that allow me to walk comfortably after 3 surgeries on my left foot. This is my third pair of this sandal, and I should probably buy several more to make sure I have them for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wear these in the river daily, and they seem to be holding up well. Very comfy and thick soles, good grip on the rocks. They float, which means my feet float when I'm wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: LOOOVE these flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Reefs for years, but always buy the Fanning. These are like walking on clouds. Seriously, they've become my new house slipper, lol. Plus the look great, have the Reef durability, and I got them on sale - WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Tegan M

customer_reviews.title: Indoor slipper
customer_reviews.text: Wifey says perfect indoor slipper, not recommend for outdoor walking, in my opinion. I did have to order one size bigger. They are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have ALWAYS loved Reef sandals, until I met these. They are horrible! They killed my feet as soon as I put them on. I sent them back for a refund. The toe area is way to narrow and they are not as squishy as they used to be. I guess if you have not ever tried any other pair of reef's, they might be fine. But I know they way they used to feel and this is not good! :(
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow for me...cushioning is only ok. Gave them to my daughter, who has no foot issues. I wouldn't recommend for anyone with knee or back problems.
customer_reviews.author: jan tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!  What happened to the comfortable uppers on the Reef Slap sandals?
customer_reviews.text: These Reef sandals were not like the first pair I bought in Hawaii three years ago. They still have a very supportive sole, but the uppers are now very thick and rough edged and uncomfortable. I hiked all over in my last pair, but this pair was gouging into the tops of my feet before the first mile was up! I now have bandaids over the wounds on the tops of my feet and am sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reef sandals for years and finally had to replace the pair I purchased 10 years ago. The new ones are great. They fit well, are attractive and give my feet plenty of support. I actually use them for gardening in the summer because I can get them wet with impunity and still have secure footwear because they do not flop around on your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Potestio

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who need a more supportive sandal
customer_reviews.text: I was super bummed to discover I could no longer walk around all day with just a cheap flip flop on, getting sore feet and calves, afraid I was doomed to wear socks and shoes all summer long :( I borrowed a pair of these from a family member and was amazed at what a little support and higher quality materials can do. I've had my pair for a few years now and I can wear them out walking for hours with no sore feet or tired legs!
customer_reviews.author: A. Knoch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, comfy flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3d or 4th pair of these things. I'd prefer to be barefoot but the podiatrist says I need the arch support which these provide but still let my toes "breathe". Slightly textured inner sole perfect for non-slip when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Gail D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and she loves them. She said they are comfortable and works good at the pool. She is a size 6 and these fit her perfectly. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Runs much smaller than the Reff Slap 2
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been wearing her Reef Slap 2's for a second summer in a size 7, even though she is a size 8 in other shoes. After leaving them at camp, I ordered her the Slap 3 in an 8m. It barely fit with no growing room. I'm not spending this kind of money on a flip flop unless they'll fit for at least a year! So, I returned them for a size 9. It worked with plenty of room to grow. As for comfort, she said the heel feels thicker than the Slap 2. She says she prefers the fit of it better. Oh well, we're still keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Flops Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love Reef sandals. This is my fifth pair and I wear them all the time during our warm months. They are extremely durable and show little wear and tear for how much I put them through. Highly recommended and the only flip flop style shoe I can wear all day without bothering me in the least bit.
customer_reviews.author: Christy M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Lesser Quality than Ones Purchased Last Year
customer_reviews.text: I love the pair of Reef Slap 3 that I bought last year (sand color). Wanted another pair, so purchased the black. What I didn't realize was that the new ones do not have the same soft leather suede uppers as the old ones. Very disappointed, uppers are synthetic material that is stiff and uncomfortable, nothing at all like soft, quality material on the old ones. Amz has the leather ones, but not in my size. Will keep trying to find them, they are the most comfortable flip flops I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: AmazUser

customer_reviews.title: Nice..
customer_reviews.text: These flip-flops are comfortable and fit my wide foot very well. Great arch support for the type of shoe it is. I'm having knee problems so I can only wear them for a few hours at a time - then I switch into my Mush flip-flops for the softer cushioning. I find these work better for me outside as the sole is more stable than most. The quality of these is very good. I inadvertently duplicated my order and received 2 pair - briefly considered returning one, but realizing it's sometimes hard to find a good flip-flop, decided to keep both and stash one.
customer_reviews.author: NannerJ

customer_reviews.title: The sole is not soft like before.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these last summer that I just love, love. They were really soft and cushiony on the bottom. I would rate those a 5 star. But these that I just received look just like the other ones, but the sole is as hard as a rock. So I am returning them and am giving it a lower rating. Other people may not mind, but I have some foot problems.
customer_reviews.author: sfsdMel

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable between the toes
customer_reviews.text: I'd owned the exact same flip flops in the past and had to have another pair. They are comfortable between the toes, but they are perfect for the beach or lake because they don't get slimy or slippery when wet. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great Sole
customer_reviews.text: The sole is firm enough to be supportive, but is "bouncy". It feels so good when I walk. I like the colors, too. These may be the most comfortable pair of Reefs I own.
customer_reviews.author: whitewater

customer_reviews.title: New Reef Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the Reef products. They seem to last a long time. When a product is made well and lasts I don't mind paying a little more for the quality. Bought the same pair of shoes 3 years ago and just decided to replace because I ware them all summer and they were starting to look old. Quality of old shoes is still great condition after 3 years of wear. Would recommend to anyone who wants a good quality and comfortable flip flop that last.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kerem

customer_reviews.title: The Most Comfortable, Supportive Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of these and wear them all day, even though I have had foot problems like plantar fasciitis in the past. They have a lot of cushioning and feel almost springy. I live in Miami and can wear sandals all year. I even wear them to take walks because they are more comfortable than my walking shoes. I have wide feet and these fit perfectly, so they probably run a but wide.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Walk all day.
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair in 2011 and wore them every summer. They are that durable. Finally the layers of the sole separated. So i ordered another pair in 2019. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Thrashertoo

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are very comfortable, I wore them right out of the box and never had to take a break from them. I can wear them 6-8 hrs. without any issues, but if you are looking for arch support these are not for you. If these Reef flip flops had better arch support they would have been perfect and I would have given them FIVE Stars. These are exceptional Reef quality... just what I expected. They cost a bit more, but last for years and not just the season. They are also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: MiaAthena

product_meta.title: Reef Women's Slap 3 Sandal
product_meta.description:
Reef womens sandal

Reef is surf. They're inspired by water, by the ocean, by perfect waves, and the journey along the way to find them. They are a genuine, global surf brand that harvests the best of the lifestyle and shares it through authentic, innovative and fashionable product. At the core of Reef is their Latin roots and the inherent sensuality of the beach. The Reef team is committed to having fun in and out of the water, as well as giving back to the world that inspires them. For half sizes, size up
feature_bullets: THE ONLY SANDAL YOU NEED: When beach sandals and athletic footwear come together, you get the Slap 3! These flip flops have become a staple for not just summer, but beach life in general. Get the traction you need to escape rogue pool puddles while also getting the comfort to withstand any adventure

FASHIONABLE FLIP FLOPS: Reef's Littles Twisted T flip flops are handcrafted to be with you no matter where your next adventure takes you. The classic and trendy design and versatility means you can seamlessly go from brunch to the beach.
NO BREAK-IN PERIOD: Packed with the comfort and support of Reef's anatomical arch support, this sandal will keep your feet comfortable no matter where they take you

AMAZING TRACTION: Built around innovative material for heel to toe support. A molded rubber outsole provides traction, protection and durability so you don't have to worry about a little water bringing you down

BEACH FREELY WITH REEF: We are encouraging people around the world to embrace the fun, freedom and spirit of the beach while living life by one simple rule: Beach Freely. Our products are designed to make you feel comfortable, relaxed and free in any environment, whether you're at the beach or not.
